```{r}


fp = curl::curl("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/NIB-SI/DiNAR/master/CKNs/translate_ath-stPanTr-RBBlong.tsv")
RBBold <- read.table(fp,
                  sep="\t", 
                  fill=TRUE, 
                  header = TRUE,
                  stringsAsFactors = FALSE,
                  comment.char = "~",
                  quote = NULL,
                  strip.white = TRUE,
                  allowEscapes = TRUE)

i = grep('Sotub', RBBold$stuIDs)
j = grep('PGSC', RBBold$stuIDs)

RBBold.GFFmerged = RBBold[union(i,j), ]
RBBold.GFFmerged = RBBold.GFFmerged[, -ncol(RBBold.GFFmerged)]
all(RBBold.GFFmerged$athID == RBBold.GFFmerged$nodeID)

names(RBBold.GFFmerged) = colnames(RBBold.GFFmerged)

```

```{r}

potatoes = stringr::str_split_fixed(RBBold.GFFmerged$stuIDs, '\\|', 3)
potatoes = as.data.frame(potatoes)
colnames(potatoes) = c('potatoe1', 'potatoe2', 'potatoe3')

# https://stackoverflow.com/questions/7597559/grep-using-a-character-vector-with-multiple-patterns
toMatch <- c("Sotub", "PGSC")
matches <- which (!grepl(paste(toMatch,collapse="|"), 
                        potatoes$potatoe1))
potatoes[matches,1] = NA
matches <- which (!grepl(paste(toMatch,collapse="|"), 
                        potatoes$potatoe2))
potatoes[matches,2] = NA
matches <- which (!grepl(paste(toMatch,collapse="|"), 
                        potatoes$potatoe3))
potatoes[matches,3] = NA

RBBold.GFFmerged = cbind(RBBold.GFFmerged, potatoes)


```

```{r}

# http://www.cookbook-r.com/Manipulating_data/Converting_data_between_wide_and_long_format/

RBBold.GFFmerged.long = tidyr::gather(RBBold.GFFmerged, potato, potatoeID, potatoe1:potatoe3, factor_key=FALSE)
RBBold.GFFmerged.long = RBBold.GFFmerged.long[!duplicated(RBBold.GFFmerged.long),]
RBBold.GFFmerged.long = RBBold.GFFmerged.long[!is.na(RBBold.GFFmerged.long$potatoeID),]
RBBold.GFFmerged.long = RBBold.GFFmerged.long[, -c(2,3,5)]

```

```{r}

# PGSC0003DMG400007237 to check BIN formatting

fp = file.path('..', 'input')
fn = 'mixedEXP2_AND_monoEXP1_logFC_padj_TMMcpm_narrow.txt'

mylen = count.fields(file.path(fp,fn), sep = "\t")
no_col <- max(mylen, na.rm = TRUE)
exp.values = read.table(file.path(fp,fn),
                    sep="\t",
                    skip = 1,
                    fill=TRUE,
                    header = TRUE,
                    # col.names=paste0("col", 1:no_col),
                    stringsAsFactors = FALSE,
                    comment.char = "@",
                    na.strings = '#N/A',
                    quote = NULL)
exp.values[grep('PGSC0003DMG400007237', exp.values[,1]), 1:4]

rownames(exp.values) = exp.values$GeneID
colnames(exp.values)[1] = 'geneID'
names(exp.values) = colnames(exp.values)


```

```{r}

logFC = (exp.values[, grep('logFC', colnames(exp.values))])
logFC = as.matrix(logFC)
pval = (exp.values[, grep('adj\\.P\\.Val', colnames(exp.values))])
pval = as.matrix(pval)

pval[is.na(pval)] = 1
pval[pval >= 0.05] = 1


logFC[is.na(logFC)] = 0
logFC[which(pval == 1)] = 0


RBBold.GFFmerged.long.X = merge(RBBold.GFFmerged.long.X, exp.values[, 1:4], by = 'geneID', all.x = TRUE, all.y = FALSE)

RBBold.GFFmerged.long.X[grep('PGSC0003DMG400007237', RBBold.GFFmerged.long.X[,1]), 1:4]

logFC = as.data.frame(logFC)
logFC$geneID = rownames(logFC)

```

```{r}

lapply(RBBold.GFFmerged.long.X, class)
athGenes = sort(unique(RBBold.GFFmerged.long.X$athID))
tmp = NULL

for (i in athGenes) {
  ind = which(RBBold.GFFmerged.long.X$athID == i)
  if (length(ind) > 1) { # (length(ind > 1)) for found, not length(ind) > 1 for multiple (1 or more, doesnt matter here)
    mysubset = RBBold.GFFmerged.long.X[ind, ]
    e = sapply(1:nrow(mysubset), function(x) sum(!is.na(mysubset[x, logFC.starts.from.col:ncol(mysubset)])))
    f1 = sapply(1:nrow(mysubset), 
            function(x) ifelse(all(is.na(mysubset[x, logFC.starts.from.col:ncol(mysubset)])), 
                                0, 
                                mean(colMeans(abs(mysubset[x, logFC.starts.from.col:ncol(mysubset)]), na.rm = TRUE), na.rm = TRUE)))
    f2 = sapply(1:nrow(mysubset), 
            function(x) ifelse(all(is.na(mysubset[x, logFC.starts.from.col:ncol(mysubset)])), 
                                0, 
                                max(abs(mysubset[x, logFC.starts.from.col:ncol(mysubset)]), na.rm = TRUE)))
    g = which(e == max(e))
    h1 = which(f1[g] == max(f1[g]))
    h2 = which(f2[g] == max(f2[g]))
    k2 = ifelse(length(h1) > 1, h2, h1)
    k = ifelse(length(g) > 1, g[k2], g)
    
    tmp = rbind(tmp, mysubset[k,])
  } else { # no match
    tmp = rbind(tmp, RBBold.GFFmerged.long.X[ind,]) # take first
  }
}

nrow(tmp) == length(athGenes)
oldRBB.organism.NGS =  tmp

```


```{r}

fp = curl::curl("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/NIB-SI/DiNAR/master/CKNs/GeI639CK5z5o7ynu")
CKN <- read.table(fp,
                  sep="\t", 
                  fill=TRUE, 
                  header = TRUE,
                  stringsAsFactors = FALSE,
                  comment.char = "~",
                  quote = NULL,
                  strip.white = TRUE,
                  allowEscapes = TRUE)

i = grep('nodeID', colnames(CKN))
j = grep('clusterID', colnames(CKN))
CKN = CKN[, sort(c(i, j, 3:5))]

```


```{r}


oldRBB.organism.NGS = merge(oldRBB.organism.NGS, CKN, by = 'nodeID', all.y = FALSE, all.x = FALSE)

table(oldRBB.organism.NGS$clusterID)
oldRBB.organism.NGS = oldRBB.organism.NGS[oldRBB.organism.NGS$clusterID != 0,]


```
